A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This movie is well done\, well filmed\, with good actors\, amazing special effects\, action scenes\, and a sub par plot with an ending that will leave you unsatisfied because it is part of a trilogy ; the ending isn't there.

They killed the most interesting characters and left the young ones alive because they pander to the young audience ; Rey and Kylo are our 20 year old ( looking ) pop stars our 12 year olds can admire.

Kylo Ren was an interesting addition at first\, but now that our over hyped Snoke is dead\, without telling us who he was\, from where he came from\, or even given enough time to develop what seemed to me like the most amazing character of the movie\, Kylo is now the head bad guy... And with such an impulsive personality\, we can now easily deduce how star wars 9 will go down like. The empire will attack\, Kylo will be baited\, he will take the bait\, Rey will defeat him and the good guys will win. Yay. Congratulations to JJ Abrams for writing himself into a corner. 

Everything else was fine about the movie though. Still worth watching. I rate it 7 on 10\, because no amount of Disney money can create an intelligent story line.
